\w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w best|strong="H2896"\w* among \w them|strong="H0935"\w*, \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* brier: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* righteous, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w thorn|strong="H4534"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w hedge|strong="H4534"\w*. \w The|strong="H0935"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* thy inspection, thy visitation cometh: \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* destruction.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* dishonoureth \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* riseth \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* law \w against|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* law: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w manâ€™s|strong="H0376"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*.
